enchantment.cgm.accelerator.desc: Increases the speed and damage of projectiles.
enchantment.cgm.collateral.desc: Makes fired projectiles pierce multiple entities.
enchantment.cgm.fire_starter.desc: Fired projectiles will set blocks and entities on fire upon impact.
enchantment.cgm.lightweight.desc: Reduces the weight of a weapon to increase ADS speed.
enchantment.cgm.over_capacity.desc: Increases the ammo capacity of a weapon.
enchantment.cgm.puncturing.desc: Creates a chance that a projectile will deal critical damage.
enchantment.cgm.quick_hands.desc: Increases the speed of reloading weapons.
enchantment.cgm.reclaimed.desc: Creates a chance that a projectile won't be consumed upon firing a weapon.
enchantment.cgm.trigger_finger.desc: Increases the speed you can fire weapons.
